{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks about the analysis that helps in determining the disproportion in the size between maxillary and mandibular teeth. Document [0] and Document [6] mention that Bolton's analysis is used to measure the mesiodistal width of the teeth and calculate the ratio between the sizes of maxillary and mandibular teeth. This analysis helps to identify any disproportion in tooth sizes, referred to as Bolton Discrepancy. Therefore, Bolton's analysis is the correct answer.", "answer_choice": "B"}
